text: The writers simply didn't know where they wanted to go with this film. The premise is very interesting, the film is fun to watch, it would be better if the confusion of ideas among the writers wasn't so obvious, the film changes direction all the time.

The Girl Next Door (2004) is a charming, funny, and surprisingly heartfelt teen comedy with great performances and a unique storyline that blends romance, risk, and youthful adventure beautifully.
É um filme engraçado a principio, mas depois de um tempo se torna repetitivo e previsível. Algumas piadas são boas mas outros coisas do filme não agregam e são somente sem nexo
this was not terrible, but instead very strange.
The movie would've been good if it focused more on a great story than obscene themes that will make some uncomfortable.The movie is also hard to sit through.
Once again critics missed the mark. Definitely worth the watch.

Cara, eu gostei muito de assistir esse filme! Ele começa como aquele típico jovem “certinho”, com uma vida planejada e sem espaço para surpresas, mas quando Danielle entra na vida dele, tudo muda. Ele mesmo no meio de tanta confusão e pressão, se mantém firme e decidido, colocando o bem-estar dela acima de tudo.
«В основе сценария лежит история одного из создателей фильма, случившаяся с ним на заре его юности.» — вера в эту жизнь стала чуточку больше.

Literally This was one of the best movies I have ever seen in my life despite all those adult scenes, plot was really amazing and creative. Although the length of movie was too much but still it's was really unpredictable and amazing. Actors were great and Casting was Amazing. This was the first movie of my life I wanted to watch again after seeing it lol.

The Girl Next Door is a surprisingly good movie a good story, good writing, likeable characters on top of a nice message on education about sex. While this movie might not be the greatest sex movie of all time like "Boogie Nights" or "Knocked Up" however it certainly is the better looking ones.
